sense.def:
Če nekaj
must happen
, je zelo pomembno, da se zgodi, ali bi bilo dobro, da se zgodi. Če nekaj
must not happen
, je zelo pomembno, da se ne zgodi, ali bi bilo dobro, da se ne zgodi.

seg.quote: Your family and children must always come first.
You must learn to remain calm.

sense.def:
Must
uporabljamo tudi za izražanje namer ali predlogov;

seg.quote: I must come over and see you when he's away.
You must play at the ship's concert.
You must come and visit me.

sense.def:
Kadar vprašamo, zakaj nekdo
must do something
, s tem pokažemo, da nas to jezi ali vznemirja in ne razumemo, zakaj tista oseba to dela.

seg.quote: Why must she be so nasty to me?

sense.def:
Izraz
if you must
uporabimo, kadar nekoga ne moremo prepričati, da ne bi naredil nečesa, kar se nam zdi napačno ali neumno.

seg.quote: Write and ask them yourself if you must.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
must be true
ali
must have happened
, s tem mislimo, da je najverjetneje bilo tako.

seg.quote: You must be very fond of her.
We must have taken the wrong road.
Rubber gloves are a must if your skin is sensitive to washing powders.
